message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think we can work out a better price. I'm willing to pay $75 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still a bit above your target. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $82.
Thanks for considering my previous offer, Alice. I'd like to stick to my budget of $80 for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I understand you're sticking to your budget, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to give you a slight discount and sell the product to you for $81.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a final offer of $80 for the product.
